name: Dinosaur Hunt - Deadly Assault
description:
Captain Foster is a young army officer who enlist into the Army to fight in Namviat. Before he comeback to home after successful mission, unfortunately in the way ship sunk due to heavy sea storm. Spending many hours in water! Luckily Foster escaped and reached at unknown Ireland cave but he was not aware of this place and his future. Eventually he listen a strange and creepy voice near the cave, Capt. Foster prepared himself to handle any critical situation with his only riffle and tried to see in dark night.



OOh Noo it’s huge and horrible creature of history “DINO”. It’s incredible deadly DINOSAUR who still exist on earth.


It's time to reload your rifle and jump into the monsters of Ireland, let’s imagine yourself as a Capt. Foster and enjoy to play a real time virtual Dino Hunting game. To kill a Dino, simply find it with help of long range gun scope and follow Dinosaur to take a clear head-shots!


You will see the most beautiful sceneries like wildlife, forest and mountains in the game - the sounds of weapons, animals, birds and hunting of Dinosaurs!


***** GAME FEATURES *****
• First Person Shooting
• 3D Dinosaurs like Velocipede, Pterodactyl & T-Rex
• Enemy AI (Artificial Intelligence)
• Real Time Jurassic Land Environment
• 3D Graphics, Interactive Sound Effects
• Amazing Mission with Different Tasks
• Different Graphics & Landscape Locations
• Earn money to unlock 4 latest guns
• Advanced automatic guns shooting experience
• Slow motion Bullet Time Combo Effects
• Jungle map to track your way
• Original sounds of Dinosaurs and bullets
• High score and current scoreboard
• Small game size and Easy to download
• No internet required while playing
